channel.title: Help
channel.description:
When ever i log out of my server i cant get back in because
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
and the only way to get back in is to reset it then all the people will loose there data lol.. how do i fix this

@ipkyouhaha wrote:

have you found a way to fix it yet? cause i have the same error
